citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The 7/7/2022, 1/10/2023 and 3/14/2023 semi-annual reports to the Institutional Official were not signed by a majority of
the IACUC committee members. The process of having the majority of the IACUC committee members sign the report to
the Institutional Official ensures that a majority of the IACUC committee members support the information within the
report, which may include deficiencies in the program for humane care and use of animals or facilities, and ensures that
the Institutional Official is kept informed and provided with accurate information on the status of both the program for
humane care and use of animals and the research facilities. Ensure that the semi-annual reports to the Institutional
Official be reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC members prior to sending to the Institutional Official. Correct
from this date, 27 April 2023, for all future semi-annual reports submitted to the Institutional Official.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives.
End of report.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The 7/7/2022, 1/10/2023 and 3/14/2023 semi-annual reports to the Institutional Official were not signed by a majority of 
the IACUC committee members. The process of having the majority of the IACUC committee members sign the report to 
the Institutional Official ensures that a majority of the IACUC committee members support the information within the 
report, which may include deficiencies in the program for humane care and use of animals or facilities, and ensures that 
the Institutional Official is kept informed and provided with accurate information on the status of both the program for 
humane care and use of animals and the research facilities. Ensure that the semi-annual reports to the Institutional 
Official be reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC members prior to sending to the Institutional Official. Correct 
from this date, 27 April 2023, for all future semi-annual reports submitted to the Institutional Official. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representatives. 
End of report.
